titles.title: Peggy Frank Memorial Act
Peggy Frank Memorial Act
To require any delivery vehicle owned or leased by the United States Postal Service have a climate control unit, and for other purposes.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Oversight and Reform.

bill.summary:
Peggy Frank Memorial Act
This bill requires, by three years after this bill's enactment, that any delivery vehicle owned or leased by the U.S. Postal Service (USPS) be modified to include a climate control unit.
The USPS may not purchase or lease any delivery vehicle unless that vehicle has a climate control unit.
